description.@en: With but a touch, you instill the fury of the wolf within an ally.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the person you touch always inflicts Injuries whenever they reduce a foe to Moderately Wounded, Seriously Wounded or Grievously Wounded.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but you can affect up to three allies instead.

criticalFailure.@en: Your friends are not worthy! Three random allies cannot inflict Injuries for the Duration.

system.distance: Any one person you can touch
